title: The Witcher iso, 1.2 patch,censorship patch(optional),no-cd crac
description:
1-Unrar The Witcher_v1.2 using winrar.
   
   2-mount the iso image useing daemon tools lite,or burn to 

Disk.
   
   3-Double click the witcher 1.2 patch, it will 

automatically install in the witcher destination folder

(c:/program files/The Witcher)
   
   4-double click the TWCF icon (censorship patch),it

will automaticaly locate and install in The Witcher

folder destination(C:/program files/The Witcher)to leave out

nudity,skip this step.

   5-Go to C:/program files/The Witcher/system folder, 

drag and drop the Witcher icon(the wolf medallion,NOT

the one in the back up exe folder)in the system folder,

copy and replace.Update the desktop short cut.

   Ive included a back up exe(the original exe.in the system

folder)for the 1.3 patch when its cracked,the 1.3 patch should work

with this copy of the game, for it is a direct rip.Enjoy.

   Please seed, i have limited bandwith and will seed for weeks as 

i see you doin your part,thx!!

   I take no credit for the rips and the patches, kudos to the

hard work these guys put into makeing this game, it rocks!!!

   Any questions,or help needed, u can E-Mail me at <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="2d464c4542571b146d41445b48034e4c">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
